text: Furry Creek is a community in the Canadian province of British Columbia. It is on Howe Sound in the Squamish-Lillooet Regional District. It is north of Vancouver and south of Squamish. == Tourism == Furry Creek has a relatively varied area of tourism. There is a golf club with a gift shop. There is the Britannia Mine Museum. There are parks, including Shannon Falls Provincial Park, which is relatively close to the area. Category:Settlements in British Columbia
title: Furry Creek
